sentences.en: And their transnational mergence of state - owned enterprises will easily lead to monopolize.
sentences.cn: 对我国 国有 企业的购并,很容易形成对某些产业部门的垄断.

sentences.en: Are You Ready to Accept Challenges from a Transnational Enterprise?
sentences.cn: 您愿意接受跨国企业的挑战 吗 ?

sentences.en: As a global transnational corporation, Microsoft's employees are required high English level.
sentences.cn: 作为全球性的跨国企业, 微软在英语方面也有一定要求.

sentences.en: Besides that, he provided transnational bank service for the Hong Kong clients.
sentences.cn: 此外, 为渣打银行香港客户在内地提供跨区域银行服务.

sentences.en: But, the appearance of transnational political phenomenon has broken these limits.
sentences.cn: 但是, 跨国政治现象的出现打破了这些限制.

sentences.en: CNPC selecting and implementing transnational operation strategy is a necessary way.
sentences.cn: CNPC选择和实施跨国经营战略是其必然之路.

sentences.en: He doesn't want his firm to be swallowed up by a transnational giant.
sentences.cn: 他不想自己的公司被一家大型的跨国公司吞并.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE : To discuss the transnational R & D strategy of Chinese pharmaceutical enterprises.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨我国制药企业的跨国 研发 发展战略.

sentences.en: Shanghai Investment Limited is a 100 % young transnational private enterprises.
sentences.cn: 上海百成投资有限公司是一家年轻的跨国民营企业.

sentences.en: The transnational corporation is out to capture the European market.
sentences.cn: 该跨国公司旨在夺取欧洲市场.

sentences.en: Transnational corporation is the body that combines trade and direct investment.
sentences.cn: 跨国公司就是二者结合的主体.

sentences.en: Transnational firms are also patenting human chromosomes, cells, tissues and organs.
sentences.cn: 同时,跨国公司还在对人类的染色体 、 细胞 、 组织和器官申请专利.

sentences.en: Transnational production plays an important role in market internationalization.
sentences.cn: 企业的跨国生产已成为当前市场国际化的一项重要内容.

sentences.en: What does transnational enterprise management system include?
sentences.cn: 跨国企业管理系统应该包含什么样的内容?

sentences.en: Within global range, acquisition has become the important transnational investment mode increasingly.
sentences.cn: 在全球范围内, 并购日益成为跨国投资的重要方式.

trans.tran_cn: 影响数国的，数国参与的，跨国的
trans.tran_en: involving more than one country or existing in more than one country
